MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL12 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Pentre Street, Council Street, St Davids Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:14PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:37PM on 27th December 2020.
